TopicTitle: Soo, I was playing around with some rocks today.

Articles.Content:
I dediced to task a save with trackig as many Potatoroids as possible. Now, I've just started, but Day 100 give some fun stuff.

You can see the pics on the KSP G+page here:

https://plus.google.com/100817669061399840558/posts/QqDqWpySbpj
Wow, that's some freaky orbits. Come on devs! Give us comets already.

Give us comets already.

That. So many thats.
Holy crap, how did some of those potatoroids end up so far out away from Kerbin?!
Gravity assist I would assume. Kerbin can give a pretty strong slingshot, especially as an unflown asteroid can get to 20 km or so before vanishing, which would cause a flown ship to land.
